TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JSONArray extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A dense indexed sequence of values.

remarks.para: A dense indexed sequence of values. Values may be any mix of , other , Strings, Booleans, Integers, Longs, Doubles, null or . Values may not be , , or of any type not listed here.
JSONArray has the same type coercion behavior and optional/mandatory accessors as . See that class' documentation for details.

Warning: this class represents null in two incompatible ways: the standard Java null reference, and the sentinel value . In particular, get fails if the requested index holds the null reference, but succeeds if it holds JSONObject.NULL.

Instances of this class are not thread safe. Although this class is nonfinal, it was not designed for inheritance and should not be subclassed. In particular, self-use by overridable methods is not specified. See Effective Java Item 17, "Design and Document or inheritance or else prohibit it" for further information.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Join (string separator);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Join(string separator) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new string by alternating this array's values with separator.

remarks.para: Returns a new string by alternating this array's values with separator. This array's string values are quoted and have their special characters escaped. For example, the array containing the strings '12" pizza', 'taco' and 'soda' joined on '+' returns this: "12\" pizza"+"taco"+"soda"

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Org.Json.JSONObject ToJSONObject (Org.Json.JSONArray names);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Org.Json.JSONObject ToJSONObject(class Org.Json.JSONArray names) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new object whose values are the values in this array, and whose names are the values in names.

remarks.para: Returns a new object whose values are the values in this array, and whose names are the values in names. Names and values are paired up by index from 0 through to the shorter array's length. Names that are not strings will be coerced to strings. This method returns null if either array is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ToString (int indentSpaces);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToString(int32 indentSpaces) cil managed

Docs.param: the number of spaces to indent for each level of nesting.
Docs.summary:
Encodes this array as a human readable JSON string for debugging, such as:
[ 94043, 90210 ]

remarks.para:
Encodes this array as a human readable JSON string for debugging, such as:
[ 94043, 90210 ]
